member.name: T:StructBasicsProblem1.ValuesStruct
member.summary: Having the ability to set values as part of a struct data type in C# - where the members are public by default

member.name: T:StructBasicsProblem1.Program
member.summary: With the classes, you can have members in a class, however by default they are private as opposed to structs where the members of structs are actually public by default
